00024     //Threads and semaphores

00027     SDL_sem* objectsToDeleteSem;
00028 public:
00029     PhysicsManager() {
00030         currentIdNumber = 0;
00031         objectsToAddSem = NULL;
00032         objectsToDeleteSem = NULL;
00033 
00034         thisThread = NULL;
00035     }
00036     ~PhysicsManager() {
00037         if (thisThread != NULL) {
00038             SDL_KillThread(thisThread);
00039         }
00040         if (objectsToAddSem != NULL) {
00041             SDL_DestroySemaphore(objectsToAddSem);
00042         }
00043         if (objectsToDeleteSem != NULL) {
00044             SDL_DestroySemaphore(objectsToDeleteSem);
00045         }
00046     }
00047     static PhysicsManager* getInstance();
00048     static void start() {
00049         PhysicsManager* theInstance = PhysicsManager::getInstance();
00050         theInstance->objectsToAddSem = SDL_CreateSemaphore(1);
00051         theInstance->objectsToDeleteSem = SDL_CreateSemaphore(1);
00052 
00053         theInstance->thisThread = SDL_CreateMemberThread( theInstance,  &PhysicsManager::loop );
00054     }
00055     void loop();
00056     int addObject(PhysicsObject* toAdd);
